title: Invesco Dynamic Large Cap Growth ETF Experiences Big Inflow - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the Invesco Dynamic Large Cap Growth ETF (Symbol: PWB) where we have detected an approximate $125.7 million dollar inflow -- that's a 16.2% increase week over week in outstanding units (from 15,750,000 to 18,300,000). Among the largest underlying components of PWB, in trading today Mastercard Inc (Symbol: MA) is up about 2.2%, Visa Inc (Symbol: V) is up about 2%, and Motorola Solutions Inc (Symbol: MSI) is lower by about 2.4%. For a complete list of holdings, visit the PWB Holdings page » The chart below shows the one year price performance of PWB, versus its 200 day moving average:
